basics.summary: Huge nerd deeply into mechanical, software, and photography.

work.summary: Prep and assembly of Printed Circuit Boards.
highlights: Preparation of circuit boards and components.
Surface Mount Technology (SMT) operation and troubleshooting.
Created automated systems to streamline several processes for increased speed and efficiency.
Ensures quality of the final product by documenting via taking photography.
Use CNC Routing to separate individual circuit boards from the panel.
Certified on 13+ machines used to perform daily tasks.
Trained employees on photo, preparation of circuit boards, components, and tinning of components.
Proficient in the operation of all the machines on assembly line within 2 years.
High versatility on several parts of the operation; able to assist as needed throughout the company.
Achieved high productivity goals regularly surpassing the assigned quota.
Assisted with marketing, restructuring and updating internal documents, and meeting customers needs.
Managed the operations of the company website; updated the website to modern technologies and UX design.
Worked alongside owner to bring new technologies and functionality to business.
